user_query: I want to fetch my order status, get top gainers, losers, volume leaders, and show interactive charts for a specific stock.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current status and details of the order with the provided ID from Crypto Swap
Retrieve the top 10 gainers, losers, and volume leaders for the daily period in the common equity type from spacHero - SPAC Database
Show the interactive charts and stock details for the stock 'GOOG' from StockyAPIExchange
